Items.ItemDesc: Bacon and Beef Burgers in a bun, whats not to love?
Like a regular Beef Burger, but with cheese!
A classic beef burger with mayo and salad
20oz of pure beef and bacon, with cheese, mayo and gherkins. Guaranteed to clog at least one artery!
A delicious creamy drink, made with a selection of dairy ingredients and flavorings
Bean burgers pan-fried to perfection and served with vegan mayo, avocado and salad
A delicious minted lamb burger served with feta cheese, hummus and salad
